summary: Completed comprehensive testing of BLOCK 56.4-56.5 Forward Equity Builder feature. Both backend APIs and frontend UI are fully functional with excellent performance.
passed_tests: Backend Health Check - API server responsive
GET /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/forward-equity - All parameter combinations working (ACTIVE/SHADOW roles, CONSERVATIVE/BALANCED/AGGRESSIVE presets, 7/14/30d horizons)
GET /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/forward-equity/grid - Complete grid for all role/preset/horizon combinations
API Response Structure Validation - All required fields (meta, summary, equity, returns, metrics, ledger) present
API Error Handling - Proper validation for invalid role/preset/horizon parameters
Frontend Forward Performance Panel Rendering - Panel correctly displayed under Strategy Panel
UI Selector Components - Preset, Horizon, and Role selectors fully functional
Metrics Display - CAGR, Sharpe, Max DD, Win Rate properly shown
Interactive Parameter Changes - Panel updates correctly when selectors are changed
No Data State Handling - Proper 'No resolved trades yet' message for 14d/30d horizons
Data Integration - Frontend successfully fetches and displays backend API data
Chart Rendering - Equity curve canvas displays when data available
Ledger Table - Transaction history table renders correctly
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (11/11 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (all UI components functional)
